title: (Mon Early Bird) Why Morgan2's Dad Wakes Her Up + We Address The Negative Comments We Get + Mailbag: Date Is a Bad Tipper
itunes:title: (Mon Early Bird) Why Morgan2's Dad Wakes Her Up + We Address The Negative Comments We Get + Mailbag: Date Is a Bad Tipper
description:
Morgan2 shares why her dad still wakes her up every morning and we share if we think it's weird or not. Plus, we address the negative comments we sometimes get and how we handle them. Mailbag: A listener recently went on a date that went well until the check came and she saw he completely undertipped even though the service was great. We give advice on what she should do in the future if it happens again. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
